text: Saint-Sulpice-le-Verdon is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2016, it became a part of the new commune of Montréverd.Arrêté préfectoral 15 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Saint-Sulpice-le-Verdon
